Address.label: Address
Address.value: 260 LITTLEFIELD AVENUE, SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94080, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Pliant Therapeutics Inc is a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company focused on discovering and developing novel therapies for the treatment of fibrosis. Its lead product candidate, PLN-74809, is an oral small-molecule dual that helps in the treatment of idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
